snippet: Morgan Neville’s documentary follows the ensemble and discusses the relevance of music in a violent world. Lovely to watch, it’s even more beautiful to hear.
abstract: Ken Jaworowski reviews Morgan Neville documentary film The Music of Strangers: Yo-Yo Ma and the Silk Road Ensemble.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Neville’s documentary follows the ensemble and discusses the relevance of music in a violent world. Lovely to watch, it’s even more beautiful to hear.

headline.main: Review: ‘The Music of Strangers,’ on Yo-Yo Ma and the Silk Road Ensemble
